quotes.quote: Those who are faithful know only the pleasures of love: it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
How unreliable is the woman caught being faithful! Today she is faithful to you, tomorrow to another.
I have no faith in my faith. My faith is in the faithful God.
When we in faith embrace Christ as our Lord and Savior, our minds are transformed.
Faith in the king comes easily in lovely times, but be faithful now and endure, pale lover.
Leave me if you must, but be faithful to me if you are with me.
Have confidence. Return. Invoke our Lady and you'll be faithful.
In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
If you be faithful, you will have that honor that comes from God: his Spirit will say in your hearts, Well done, good and faithful servants.
We are not here to be successful, we are here to be FAITHFUL.
Otherwise without faith it becomes very difficult to keep pushing forward every day.
The best thing about love is the trust, the best thing about trust is honesty, and the best thing about honesty is faithfulness.
Faithfulness and loyalty is not an option in a relationship, it's a priority if it must work.
We can only be faithful to what we remember, and we remember only what we have known.
If your man were the faithful type you wouldn't have to worry about other women. Realize that it's his job to be faithful to you.
You have to be faithful in little before you are entrusted with much.
If you wonder how long Ill be faithful. I'll be happy to tell you again. I'm gonna love you forever & ever, forever & ever amen.
Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
To love is to be faithful to those who cheat on us.
Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
One secret to my success is that I am faithful to my dreams and don't cheat on my dreams by taking drugs or blaming others when things don't go right.
Become faithful to yourself, if you do, it will come natural towards everyone else.
God wants to be faithful and make sure that He restores me and you to our original purpose, a pure and holy people when He comes again.
We shouldn't have to be faithful, we should want to be faithful.
Dont worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.
Be faithful in small things because it is in them your strength lies.
Faith is unseen but felt, faith is strength when we feel we have none, faith is hope when all seems lost.
Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
At times one remains faithful to a cause only because its opponents do not cease to be insipid.
I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives.

It is a truism to say that the dog is largely what his master makes of him: he can be savage and dangerous, untrustworthy, cringing and fearful; or he can be faithful and loyal, courageous and the best of companions and allies.
He who loveth a book will never want a faithful friend, a wholesome counsellor, a cheerful companion, or an effectual comforter.
